title: Enhancing Clinical Nursing Competencies: Developing Professional Vision (PV) for Pre-service Teachers: Video-based

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain professional perspectives on classroom management (PVCM), instructional support (PVIS), and emotional support (PVES).
Learners improve their ability to simultaneously evaluate multiple educational quality factors through video-based analysis.

Learners will write analytical reports applying integrated or segregated approaches to three educational field cases (e.g., patient safety incidents, interdisciplinary conflicts, clinical errors).
